name: Time Out (jonathon.sherwood)
description:
Time Out is a Global Game Jam 2021 game that has the player helping their friends at daycare. Your friends have all lost their toys, and it's up to you to find out who is missing what, and to go find it without being caught in the act! Gather all the toys before the day is over and it's time to go home.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to begin dialogue

SPACE to continue dialogue

Credits:

Project Lead, Lead Design, Lead Programming: Jonathon Sherwood

Art Lead, Level Design: Britnee Owens

Screaming SFX: Brittnee Owens and Jonathon Sherwood

Open Source Audio:

Music: Komiku

Caught: Taira-Komori

Item: Jomse

Quest: Treasuresounds

Door: InspectorJ
